verses.text: Hear, O Lord, \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*: \w give|strong="H1961"\w* ear \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* supplication \w in|strong="H1961"\w* thy truth: hear \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* thy justice.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* enter not \w into|strong="H0413"\w* judgment \w with|strong="H0413"\w* thy servant: \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* thy sight no man living \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* justified.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* enemy hath persecuted \w my|strong="H5046"\w* soul: \w he|strong="H6440"\w* hath brought \w down|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5046"\w* life \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth. \w He|strong="H6440"\w* hath \w made|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H6440"\w* darkness \w as|strong="H6440"\w* those \w that|strong="H5046"\w* have been dead \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w old|strong="H6440"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w is|strong="H7307"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* anguish \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*: \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w heart|strong="H7307"\w* \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H7307"\w* troubled.

\w I|strong="H5315"\w* remembered \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w days|strong="H0369"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* old, \w I|strong="H5315"\w* meditated \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H4480"\w* thy works: \w I|strong="H5315"\w* meditated \w upon|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* works \w of|strong="H4480"\w* thy hands.

\w I|strong="H0776"\w* stretched forth \w my|strong="H3068"\w* hands \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee: \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* without water unto thee.

\w Hear|strong="H7181"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* speedily, O Lord: \w my|strong="H3588"\w* spirit hath fainted \w away|strong="H4480"\w*. Turn \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w away|strong="H4480"\w* thy face \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, lest \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H4480"\w* \w like|strong="H1809"\w* unto \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* go \w down|strong="H3588"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* pit.

Cause \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* hear thy mercy \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* morning; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* hoped. \w Make|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w way|strong="H5921"\w* \w known|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, wherein \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* walk: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thee.
Deliver me from my enemies, O Lord, to thee have I fled:
Teach me to do thy will, for thou art my God. Thy good spirit shall lead me into the right land:
For thy nameâ€™s sake, O Lord, thou wilt quicken me in thy justice. Thou wilt bring my soul out of trouble:
And in thy mercy thou wilt destroy my enemies. And thou wilt cut off all them that afflict my soul: for I am thy servant.
